attributes.action: Scrap the new tax rates on air flights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This tax has been imposed in the guise of a green tax to save the environment.
This is yet another tax mainly on the middle class. Not all countries are imposing this tax so therefore its objective is ineffective.This has increased the prices of holidays so much that some families will be unable to afford a holiday outside the uk.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
